uw.story: A sword of authority passed down to the masters of ShadowHilts. This sword contains the power of mighty beings that made a pact to serve the ShadowHilts. Some of them were Elementals, some were innocent spirits, and some even demons. It is known that tens of thousands of evil forces fell to this sword. It also has a demonic quality that binds the spirit of the slain evil to the blade. Despite its great power, fewer than 5 people in 600 years that were able to wield this sword. Seria, the 101st Heir of ShadowHilts and the only master in history chosen by the sword, entered the pact with the sword to put her beloved sister to rest.

ut.story: A silver ring that represents the ShadowHilts. Seria touches it whenever she feels her life is meaningless. Doing so would remind her of her dead comrades, filling her heart with the need for vengeance against her sister Erze. Ironically, the ring has a note written by Erze, hidden within the ring's jewel when she was young, but Seria still doesn't know about it.

s3.description: Brandishes a moon-bloodying sword, dealing 376079 M.DMG to enemies in a wide range, and additional 186384 M.DMG on non-Hero enemies. If the target is not a hero, deals additional 195815 M.DMG.The caster is not affected by ATK Spd related effects while casting.

ut.story: The candle known to have been on the table of the meeting hall where ancient warriors from different continents gathered to defeat supernatural beings. Blazing on this old candle is a blue exorcising flame. When the flame touches an evil being, it sucks the vitality out of the creature's body. This is the first material Seria uses whenever she refines her sword.

uw.story:
When did this all begin...?
This torment that comes with unending thirst...
But after quenching that thirst...
My heart throbs with burning hatred against you, Seria...
...Ah, Seria. I have no other choice.
I need this power to satisfy this endless thirst. This ever-flowing essence of power is the only cure to my eternal torment.
Ah... This ecstasy...
More... Someone, thrill me more.

ut.story:
A wine made by Erze herself with the blood of fallen priests.
One of her greatest pleasures is forcing those once considered holy to kneel before her. Inside the bottle is a bloody cross, and those who hear Erze drinking the wine off it shiver and tremble as the sound of the cross clanging inside.

ut.story:
A dark red lipstick made from the blood of those who died disgraceful deaths.
The ones who abandoned their dignity as humans and caved in to their insatiable desires failed to escape Erze's grasp.
They died while in a complete trance state, but perhaps they might still feel happy about being used by Erze.
Erze uses it to leave a mark on the neck of her prey after she has fed on them.

uw.story: A magic gear crafted with pitch-black metal called Adamantite, tempered with the dark flame and the lightning of a black dragon. It holds the grudge and rage of black dragons that were killed during the Demon War. Neraxis threatened the dwarves to forge this special weapon for him. Then, he cursed and enchanted it with the grudge-filled souls of black dragons. Anyone who touches this weapon beside Neraxis will hear the raging roars of vengeful dragons.

ut.story:
A hair accessory that Laias dropped while cleansing the waters corrupted by demons. Neraxis found it and kept it, but he still hasn't decided whether he'll give it back.
It's not likely that Laias will get her lost hair accessory any time soon.

ut.story:
Crafted with his own fang, this stake holds Neraxis's burning rage.
When Neraxis attacks with the stake, the great energy, entangled with Neraxis's powers, swirls at the enemy at a terrifying speed.
It is powerful enough to penetrate all things, and rip off the limbs of those who come near it.

uw.story: A magical pot known to have been used by a legendary chef in the distant past. It is made with magical metal that even Blacksmith Jin hasn't ever seen before. It has the effects of boosting the taste and aroma of the food, maximizing the natural quality of ingredients. It is such a rare treasure, but it is seldom used by its owner, Juno. As she has great pride in her culinary skills, people assume that she does not like to rely upon such magical artifacts. As a result, the most precious treasure in the culinary world is now merely a decoration in Juno's inn. When the day comes that she decides to use it, however, the world will witness a whole new level of cooking.

ut.story: A jar that Juno in her naive days bought at a rip-off price from a suspicious merchant. The merchant told her that the jar was able to turn plain water into magical broth. He managed to demonstrate the process with his nimble hands, and successfully made her fall for it. What he didn't know, however, was that the Jar would actually become a true Jar of Happiness through Juno's amazing culinary skills. With greatly improved Juno's culinary skills and the addition of Juno's Special Seasoning, an improved version of the magical broth powder that the merchant used, the jar is now one of the most important kitchen tools in Juno's inn, producing top-notch dishes.

ut.story:
- Here is your order, Juno's Special! No one takes the banner in front her inn that says 'Excellent Taste! Quality Guaranteed!' seriously until they put the food in their mouths. There are very few words that do Juno's food justice. When she was asked what her secret was, she smiled and answered.
- It's Juno's Special Seasoning!

uw.story: An ancient Weapon forged for the most glorious being on earth. Only permitted to the successor to the God King, one should undergo tremendous ordeals to prove his worth as its owner. This bow, allowed only for the chosen successor to the God King, has absolute power in the desert.

ut.story: An hourglass that was buried underground for a long time by an enormous sandstorm that struck Aegina Desert. When the sand in the hourglass moves, it calls for the mirage of an ancient city coming back to life. The high priest of the ancient kingdom used this to show the glory of the kingdom to its people in the past. Seeing their city shining in gold, people grew proud of their kingdom.

'Pit of Sand' has a 25% chance of inflicting 1 stack of [Mark of Desert] and draws in all enemies in range to the center.

ut.story: A magical sword passed down through the God King's descendants. The name 'Oasis' comes from how it was used to serve the people in dire times. After the kingdom fell, its whereabouts was unknown to the world until Zafir saw it among Kumuro's art collections and bought it at an incredibly high price. With the sword finally returning to the worthy descendant, Zafir was able to inherit his forefather's spirits, maximizing his potentials.

s4.dark: Activation chance changes to 30%.

uw.story: A rare treasure that is the manifestation of passion burning like a flame in the desert. A pair of these beautiful weapons is known to have been stored in the ancient God King's repositorium. When swung, they beautifully sound like the wind with the scent of a breeze. It is a sweet but lethal temptation, just like a mirage in the desert...

s2.light: Gains 2 orbs of mana after movement. Gained Mana is consumed over 10 sec.
s2.dark: After using [Enchanting Flow], [Alluring Ambush] can be used twice within 10 sec.

ut.story: A chest containing the artifacts needed for worship rituals for the Dragon of Water. Some ornaments on it are crafted with 'Azure Lapis Lazuli,' a gem that represents complete fullness. It is the dearest thing that Laudia's father treasures, and is only given to those who have the ability to lead the entire Trovatia tribe.

s3.dark: Mana cost is increased by 1 and DMG is increased by 100%.

ut.story: A legendary Veil only given to the best dancer in the continent. Performing a dance with it on can mesmerize those who are watching. Laudia used the veil to mesmerize enemies with her seductive dance and achieved everything she wanted.

uw.story: An infinite spring that endlessly spouts water. It is a jar made by the first Blue Dragon, who ruled all waters on earth. It reacts to the imagination of the user. To a young, sensitive and creative girl like Lilia, it is the greatest treasure and weapon.

ut.story: A gold necklace for girls that Laias crafted for Lilia with a Gem of Protection. It gleams with the energy of water elementals in it. It is a symbol of Laias's care for her little sister.

ut.story: A kettle that Lilia's old cacti friends made for her on her birthday. The kettle infinitely produces the cleanest and purest water there is. However, if too much water is used at once, it shuts its spout, which is a featured added by the Cacti to help Lilia stay in control of the water until she becomes more skilled at it.

uw.story: An artifact from an ancient civilization that has an engine that provides unlimited power. It's a mighty weapon with the power of a siege weapon, and its power comes close to that of the highest-rank magic. This weapon was found in the ruins of the old Republic of Gray, but it remained in storage since no one knew how to use it. Long after that, Kara was excavated and once she awakened, it teleported to her side. The highest-ranking technomagic weapon that was made in a similar way as the Mountain Fortress.

It's the basic technology that Annette used to make the Rascal, but not even she has been able to figure out everything about this special technology. A permanent engine that continuously creates unlimited magic power.

uw.story: Curses are born from negative feelings such as hatred, jealousy, and resentment. These are the best food for Shamilla. The wings that grew powerful during the Demon War by absorbing the curses of countless people are terrifying to normal people. Those who are touched by the feathers are said to be bound by many curses, and they fall into a vortex of emotions. In that abyss, a captivating and seductive laughter echoes. The laughter of a demon that enjoys the different kinds of human feelings.

s1.description: Attacks an enemy dealing 194847 M.DMG and inflicting Curse of Petrification for 3 seconds that can't be dispelled. The enemy under the Curse of Petrification will have ATK Spd reduced by 200 , and this effect gets stronger up to max 600% as time passes. When the curse ends, petrifies the target for 3 seconds.

ut.story: A strange jewel from which the resentful whispers of ancient demons can be heard. A cursed item filled with the souls of long forgotten ancient demons. They wish to escape every day, but she won't let them out that easily. Her soul has accepted all the curses of the world, so it is as deep and dark as the abyss.

ut.story: Shamilla has been cursed to hold all the curses in the world inside her, but could also be seen as a savior who binds all those curses. Her death would mean that all the evil she holds within would go back out into the world. This Jar of Curses that Shamilla made is used to retrieve the curses that Shamilla spat out.

s4.name: The Vessel of Curses

For the duration of the shield, gains Immunity to CC. Upon the activation of the skill, consumes The Vessel of Curses to have 4 enemies as the target.

All effects of curse are enhanced.

uw.story: A weapon for Enhanced Human Type. 0 that was made after thousands of attempts in one of the laboratories of the empire. Enhanced Human Type. 0 destroyed everything as soon as he woke up from the laboratory in order to find a weapon that could withstand his power. In the end, he tore out the horn of the monster Cannibal, which was known to have swallowed Arrogance out of the 7 sins. This horn went through the hands of the greatest blacksmiths of the empire and became the Blood Lancer Monolith. The flame of sin is burning inside the weapon, and whatever it pierces cannot be healed. The feeling of striking with this weapon is pleasurable enough to make him forget about the lingering attachment to his lost memory.

s1.description: Prevents the target from receiving positive effects for 4 seconds, and attacks to inflict 172198 P.DMG and knocks the target back. Inflicts 66147 P.DMG after 1 second to enemies around the target and stuns them for 4 seconds.

s2.name: Remove Limit
s2.description: Upon activation, [Remove Limit] takes effects. When activated, consumes 10% of current HP to remove all negative effects on self and deals 179376 P.DMG to nearby enemies in range. While [Remove Limit] is activated, consumes 2.5% of current HP every 1 second, gains Immunity to CC, and increases Crit DMG by 50% and ATK Spd by 350. HP consumption and the increase in Crit DMG and ATK Spd grow larger as time passes. This effect cannot be dispelled, and is automatically deactivated when HP is under 25%.
s2.light: Enemies hit are stunned for 2 sec.
s2.dark: HP consumption per sec is increased by 100% and ATK Spd, Crit DMG boost is doubled.

ut.story:
An item given to Chase by Scarlet. She gave it to him because she felt sorry for him for not having a name. Chase's name is embroidered in one corner of the handkerchief.
It doesn't really match his look, but he carries it all the time.
Chase lost his memory and could only figure out who he was by the test subject code marked on his waist. The moment when someone called him by a name was when he finally found a goal in life.
He decided to use his overflowing power to protect those who made him feel alive.

s3.name: Burn, Spear of Fury
s3.description: Charges at an enemy, inflicting 115781 P.DMG and knocking it down, and explodes the ground around self to attack 4 times, dealing a total of 228364 P.DMG and inflicting Stun for 4 seconds. Recovers HP equal to 25% of DMG.
s3.light: Gains Immunity to CC while in use.

ut.story: Pauldron that Chase wears on one shoulder. It is made up of special ores that are hard to find in the Orbis Continent. It's light but extremely sturdy and unbreakable. An item that Demia managed to get for Chase, since Scarlet was fond of him. Demia didn't show it much, but she was intrigued by how Chase normally seemed so naive, and yet was so enthusiastic when it came to sparring. Demia watched him for a few days, and one day, patting his shoulder, she nonchalantly gave Chase the pauldron. She told him that fighting was important, but it was also important to take care of his own body.

uw.story:
The halberd held by an ancient guardian statue defending the gate of the labyrinth that was recently discovered at the Royal Underground. The old, eroded statue was holding the halberd firmly in its hands, as if showing its determination to protect the labyrinth against intruders. Loman, who was in charge of the labyrinth excavation, felt something indescribably sublime from the statue and showed due courtesy in front of it. At that moment, the statue dropped its halberd to the ground and began to crumble away. The halberd itself seemed unaffected by time and was imbued with a mysterious energy.
'That statue suddenly crumbled and dropped the halberd...'
Scarlet said, glancing over the report.
'Yes, ma'am.'
Scarlet then gazed at Loman.
'The unyielding sincerity of protecting a place until his very body collapses... I know a man like that.'
'Pardon, ma'am?'
He looked at Scarlet with a puzzled face as she handed over the halberd, smiling.

ut.story: Loman used to carve small sculptures as big as his hand while sorting out his thoughts when things went wrong. As he smoothed out their edges, he'd feel at peace, recalling how he was when he was just learning the basics. It was just a pastime at first, but soon it became his hobby, a passion that filled his room with hundreds of sculptures. And one day, Loman started to make wooden dolls to give to his friends and his men. Back then, sorcerous dolls known to protect hearts from evil were popular in Orvelia. Loman asked an old shaman who practiced ancient folk remedies to enchant his wooden dolls with a spell of protection, and he gave them to his colleagues.

ut.story: An heirloom of Loman's family, this special pendant is bestowed by the first King of Orvelia to Loman's family in honor of their service and loyalty to protect the Orvel Monarchy. Its true origin is unknown, but it is believed to be an accessory that has the spirit of the Guardian of Orbis Continent from an ancient civilization. The owners of this item have said the same thing. When they resolve to stake their lives to defend what is important to them, they invoke a mighty power like the waves of the sea. People now believe this blue gem invokes spirits, and it started to be called the Sea of Invocation. Loman received it as an heirloom from his father when he entered the castle, and he always keeps it with him.

uw.story: Legends speak of a mysterious metal, gold as the glorious rays of the sun, blue as the pure sky, and white as the blinding light. This holy sword and shield set has been forged from that special metal that only Angels can handle. These are divine relics of protection, created to banish the darkness and fill the world with light. Bestowed only to the most righteous Guardian Knight of the Angels, these relics can instantly incinerate any Demon that faces their light.

Bracelet made by the Archangels to protect the Angels when they descend down to earth. It contains the sun, so it shines brilliantly.
When the angels feel fear, it is said that the sunlight from the bracelet protects their souls. And the fates of the angels are intertwined in the bracelet, so when they feel like their lives are threatened, they can feel each other's pain instinctively.

uw.story: It is unarguably the culmination of the latest imperial technomagi technology. It can transform into three modes, the last of which uses magic that is so devastating that its use has to be restricted. According to Valance, the head of the imperial weapons development organization Magos Le’Flamme, the new weapon Archistra was stolen, immediately after its development, by Crow, a former naval officer who was dishonorably discharged. It remains to be confirmed whether Crow really did manage to infiltrate one of the Empire's most important organizations to steal Archistra... It's also possible that Valance simply handed it over to him, given their long friendship.

This harp, which insists that it be called 'Mr. Schute,' can significantly amplify the wielder’s mana and spray it all around the wielder. Since the amplified mana is scattered about, it cannot be effectively used as offensive magic. However, depending on how it's used it can prove to be extremely effective in other ways. Mr. Schute is quite a chatterbox, but only to those he considers as his friends. These days he only talks to Shea.

uw.story: Ezekiel's father was one of the highest-ranking Demons. Although he does not know his father's name or face, he is aware of the tremendous power of the Demon blood he inherited. The Demon blood flowing within his veins also gave him a second personality. When his human blood prevails, Ezekiel is a young man of excellent character. At other times, he is an immensely powerful and arrogant Demon, just like his father. Barbatos, Jailer of Despair, manifests itself when Ezekiel's Demon blood is in full power. Taking the form of one of his arms, this weapon is powerful enough to slash through dimensions and sever the space itself. It is the physical representation of his father's power.

ut.story: A bond containing the mana of an unknown priest. Young Ezekiel used to go berserk frequently. If anyone insulted his mom, he would allow his boiling demon blood to take over. Once he return to his senses, he would stare at his wounded arm and his terrified mom. When he was older, Ezekiel was getting rid of demons when he got into an argument with a bigger priest of Lua. He went berserk, just like any other day. Ezekiel was alone when he came to, and he was taken aback by the bond on his cursed arm. When he tried to take it off, he found that the priest's magic couldn't be shaken off so easily. However, he stopped going berserk and losing his consciousness after that. He's gained greater control over his mana, so it's now one of his most treasured items.

s4.name: Cursed Blood
s4.description: Ezekiel gains 1 stack of 'Cursed Blood' at the end of skill. Upon the 4th stack, consumes Cursed Blood to reset all skill cooldown, dealing 220255 M.DMG to nearby enemies and knocking them down for 3 sec, while activating Fury for 10 sec, that cannot be dispelled. While in Fury state, goes into an auto-battle mode that cannot be controlled, and ATK is increased by 74819 , auto attack DMG is doubled, and all Skill effect are reinforced. Cannot gain Cursed Blood during Fury state, except for when killing an enemy.
s4.light: When in Fury state, heal rate is increased by 50%.
s4.dark: Per every stacked 'Cursed Blood', takes 12% reduced DMG.

t5.dark: When in Fury state, auto attack deals DMG that ignores DEF.

uw.story: Tarot card reading is a common fortune telling method for witches. Some witches use customized cards to suit their personal styles. Ophelia's cards also function as the proof of the pacts between her and the creatures she summons. Quite popular as a guide of destiny among the entities of the mysterious dimensions, she has made pacts with countless creatures. Del Arcana, a powerful tarot deck carefully assembled by Ophelia, is the physical proof of these relationships.

Spirit of love, Elliciad's heart.
It eats both fulfilled and unfulfilled loves, so it can sometimes be as hot as lava, or as cold as ice. The power it displays depends on how contaminated a soul is, and it can display an extensive light of blessing to those with pure souls.

uw.story: A legendary Holy Sword given to the world by Lua. This legendary artifact materialized 100 years ago when the Demons invaded the Orbis Continent through the Dimensional Gate. According to the legend, the Hero King Kyle used this sword to pierce the heart of the Dark Lord Angmund and brought an end to the war. However, the two simply vanished, and only Aea remained.

uw.story: The group of assassins known as the Laughing Mask has been the master of the Orvel's underworld for a long time. Only the best assassin of the Laughing Mask is allowed to wield this dreadful pair of daggers. It is said that the wounds inflicted by these daggers never heal, and that their victims inevitably bleed to death. According to the legend, these daggers were made from the scythe of the Grim Reaper.

Over the ages, it ended up in the hands of an archmage, who turned it into the core of his staff. Later, the archmage presented this staff to his precious disciple.

It's very powerful, but it also requires a lot of mana. Cleo took the Scroll of Burning Hell from the Tower of Sage, which was considered a forbidden scroll. Now she's using it to enhance her Fire Rain.

uw.story: In the Tower of Sage, the title of Purple indicates the pinnacle of mana capacity. Aisha's seemingly endless mana was simply too much for regular means of output. For this reason, the von Daphnel family bought out all the best mana stones they could find, and took them to Annette, the best technomagi in Orvel Castle. Annette gladly agreed to take on this new project. Soon after, she created Mahitra, a beautiful umbrella befitting an aristocratic wizard of noble destiny.

uw.story: The essence of technomagic, created based on Annette's theory. Five of the highest-ranking court wizards of Orvel have poured their energy into creating this magical being. It has its own will, making it capable of making independent decisions and acting on them. While it shares its mana with Annette, it can also utilize any other available mana nearby. As such, it is the first great milestone in Annette's effort to make magic available to all.

ut.story:
A healing script for emergencies.
It's a product of the secret society of magic engineering, Babel's workshop for the month, 'Battles are Self-serve! Winning scripts in Mechanic Script Battles.' Created by Annette, it's a skill that can heal allies just through engineering, without borrowing any healing magic powers.

s3.name: Process of Elimination

ut.story: The top secret code of Babel, the secret society of magic engineering. Magic for normal people! The secret society of technomagi, Babel, is an anonymous society that dreams of making magic available to all. They have each provided a technomagical technique as a secret code, and they've only allowed the use of it to those who can decipher it. Annette deciphered a top secret code in 4 minutes and is using it in the annihilation process.

uw.story: A powerful weapon of light that can take the form of a spear, a dagger, or a bow. One of the divine treasures of the Angels blessed by an archangel. It is said to be capable of incinerating evil. Due to its versatility, it has traditionally been given to the most talented scout. The number of Demons who perished under its light during the war is too high to count.

ut.story: Angel Arbiter Pilier's soul egg. Pilier was born from Lua's first flame, and is Arch's master. Pilier was the best Angel warrior and was the one to end the war against the Demons. But after using all of his power, he went back to being an Eye of Heaven, which is the soul egg form, and Arch is holding onto his master's soul.

uw.story: This sacred treasure of Penteonia is said to have been sent from the Heavens to eradicate the Demons. This Light Staff, known to respond only to those worthy of sainthood, radiated with splendid light in the hands of the young Artemia, as if to honor the future empress. It calls upon the power of absolute light, unleashing heaven's vengeance upon its enemies while protecting its wielder with divine light.

ut.story: Earrings made from light kveril, a rare mineral that is said to only come out in Penteonia. When Artemia was crowned Empress, she received it along with the crown. It doesn't lose its light even at night, and it actually shines even more brightly in the dark. It's known as the jewel of principles and brilliance amongst the people. An item that raises the dignity of the queen as they shine from her ears.

ut.story: A crown that is passed down to the king of Penteonia. A part of it had been broken by a previous tyrant, but it's been repaired. A new red gem called the Soul of the Sun has been embedded at the center of the crown. Its dignified form compels one to kneel before it in a show of respect.

uw.story: Even among the holy relics bestowed to the high priests of the Church of Lua, the God's Book Genesis is special. According to the legend, this book, guarded throughout the ages by the Grand Priests of the church, was written by Lua herself. Iris, the current Grand Priest, upon receiving a revelation regarding Baudouin, entrusted this book to his step father, Berman. Later, the book was given to Baudouin when he became a high priest. It is said that this divine relic provides infinite holy energy to its owner, along with the power to unlock the true potential of those who have faith.

ut.story: The last chapter of the legend that was too horrifying and terrifying to put in the Bible. It talks about the holy light that kills the darkest enemy in the world.

uw.story: Cassandra works double as an arms dealer. One day, a stolen item came into her possession which immediately caught her attention. It was a beautiful fan adorned with gold decorations and precious gems. According to the rumors, every single lady who possessed this fan soon fell into great misfortune. It has been circulating the market as a cursed item. As soon as she bought it, Cassandra began investigating its origin. As it turned out, this fan, named Goldbreeze, had been created to serve as a concealed weapon. It shouldn't be too hard to guess as to what kind of misfortune the unaware owners of this fan might have suffered.

ut.story:
A luxurious accessory made by the greatest jeweler in the continent.
A limited edition ornament created by jeweler Larik.
Any person in high society on the Orbis Continent would love to have one.
His work is said to be the epitome of art, and it is said to heal and grant courage.
There are only 3 of the limited edition Fancy Ornaments, and one of them obviously belongs to the master of the Gold Bar.

ut.story: A legendary gold flame necklace pendant. The legendary Gold King made this gold flame necklace pendant to get the attention of the Goddess of Love and Beauty. Its gold scent creates a Tempting Wave that makes anyone join their side and be loved by everyone.

uw.story: A sword and shield set engraved with various Runes and infused with ancient magic. These legendary items are said to have been created eons ago by an ancient dragon named Exian, using its own scales. As one of the royal treasures of Orvel, the sword is bestowed only to the knight of the most honorable principles. Its wielder shall serve as the defender of the kingdom and its people, and the protector of life.

He has since engraved the names of his deceased comrades in order to remember his determination as a guardian knight. Each time he pushes away enemies with the shield, the knight's firm determination helps him tap into power beyond his limits.

The rune from the Guardian Knights bolsters a knight's iron will and loyalty, increasing the effectiveness of the Guardian Shield.

uw.story: One day, a vein exuding powerful mana was discovered in the territory of Ziltrion. While investigating, Demia found a blue ore, the likes of which she had never seen before. Numerous wizards and alchemists studied this mysterious ore with the characteristics of both gem and metal, but no one could figure out its identity. Jin the blacksmith, however, had a different idea. As soon as he saw the ore, he offered Demia to craft powerful gears out of it, with a big smile on his face. With it, he forged a lance and a shield, glowing blue with mana and tougher than diamond.

ut.story: A stone known to protect one's soul from being absorbed by evil. It only shines for a while at dawn, so it's hard to find. One day, when Demia was tired from battle, a comrade put this in her hands. Even though it's a comrade that she can't ever see again... Demia always takes this stone when going out to the battlefield. She does her best to uphold her vow to never let the sacrifices of her comrades be in vain.

uw.story: A treasure of the Dark Elves created using a powerful moonlight stone from Arrovina and a moon tree branch of the highest quality. Nerius is a perfect medium for Moonlight Magic, and it is one of the most powerful magic weapons of the Dark Elves. However, it is said that the beautiful silver light of the moon can easily be tainted by darkness. A sublime love has turned into deep darkness, and the dark elf longing for vengeance has fused that darkness into this weapon.

ut.story: Tear fragments of the beast Heltanios, who lived at the bottom of the Fountain of Life. It spews out pitch darkness, and those who see its eyes end up having their souls stolen by the powerful dark energy. Those who become the master of these eyes will obtain great power and insight. When Dimael was captured in Aegina and was at the brink of death, Maria embedded these eye fragments.

uw.story: A deadly scythe that matches the characters of its wielder, Epis. It reaps the souls of those who approach it to admire its beauty. Created from within Epis's own body, the weapon is much like a succubus itself. It delivers extreme pleasure to its victims before absorbing their life energy. It seems that, in a way, Epis tried to show some sort of kindness with this weapon.

The dancing of a girl wearing red heels caught her eyes, and she made a deal with her in exchange for the those shoes. Epis wears her seductive heels and get carried away when inflicting pain on her enemies with her dance.

uw.story: A set of enchanted weapons bestowed upon Fluss's grandfather, a knight hailing from the Republic of Gray, and passed down as family treasures. They are capable of gradually enhancing the physical abilities of their wielder, allowing him to break the boundaries of human limitations and gain supernatural power and speed. Because the effect is gradual, there is no sudden stress to the wielder's body. Each piece is called Blood and Rose, respectively. The names originated from the swirl of blood splatter and flower petals that follow whenever Fluss swings these twin swords. No other warrior has been able to utilize their potential as Fluss does.

ut.story: A rose that will never wither, even if it's been picked. It's a flower that Fluss loves. It reminds Fluss about the duty of a knight, which is the basis for his strong will that allows him to be confident in battle.

uw.story: It is said that there lives a sacred beast protecting the Barbarians in the Windland Snow Mountain. This beast, capable of dispelling the power of darkness, is supposed to be a blue phoenix composed of ice. Created in the shape of this beast is Numinu, its name means 'holy.' It has been crafted from enchanted ice that never melts. Considered a holy relic among Barbarians, this weapon is bestowed to their mightiest warrior. The wielder of this weapon is the most powerful warrior among Barbarians, and may be considered their king.

ut.story:
Trumpet made with the horn of the guardian beast of Windland Snow Mountain, Orox. Orox of the Snowy Mountain grants noble warriors great power and the ability to see the truth.
When a warrior who has received the blessing of Orox blows this horn, it will boost the morale of comrades and bring clarity to their minds.

When the first Barbarian King settled down in Windland, he swore to become the guardian of the snowy mountains and shared this mug with the holy beings of the mountains. The protect magic of the frost wolf imbued in the Barbarian Mug increases the ATK of Vortex and the effect of Freeze.

uw.story: A pair of gauntlets custom forged for Gladi. They are the proof of his winning the championship at the Orvel Arena. Supposedly, these were crafted from a legendary pair of gauntlets used by a man who was known as the War God hundreds of years ago. These gauntlets, specialized for smashing the opponent, greatly enhance the power of their wearer. However, the physical cost of using them is brutal, and no normal person can handle them. Unless the wearer is incredibly flexible, and physically capable of withstanding the impact of each blow, using them is almost suicidal. Nevertheless, Gladi's natural strength and flexibility allow him to use them freely.

ut.story: Silvervine is used to exponentially boost physical ability. Nothing else, but this silvervine. Others may try chewing silvervine, drink it, boil it, but it won't work. Gladi just needs this silvervine to have the effect of the War God.

uw.story: When Malduk's magic resurrected Jane as an undead, she should not have felt anything. Yet, she felt warm and comfortable as mysterious energy surrounded her dead body. She should not have been able to even feel it. But when Malduk took her, she instinctively reached out to the warm presence. Later, when a mysterious magic brought her back to consciousness, the first thing she did was to inspect her coffin, which radiated with tragic yet warm love. Inside, she found the following message carefully engraved: 'My unchanging love for you.'

ut.story:
The cushion that Jane hugs to sleep inside the coffin. It's imbued with the spirits that fell asleep with her inside the coffin.
They constantly give the hollowness of death to Jane.

s3.description: For 15 sec, deals a total of 36690 M.DMG to all enemies and recovers 100% of DMG as own HP. Gains immunity to CC. Marked enemies take increased DMG.
s3.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Has a 10% chance to Stun enemies for 1 sec.

ut.name: Flowers of a Forgotten Dukedom
description: [Day of Ruin] DMG is increased by 20% and with every DMG dealt, target's M.DEF is reduced by 5% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.
[Day of Ruin] DMG is increased by 24% and with every DMG dealt, target's M.DEF is reduced by 5% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.
[Day of Ruin] DMG is increased by 29% and with every DMG dealt, target's M.DEF is reduced by 5% for 5 sec. This effect can be stacked max 10 times.

ut.story: A flower of the Republic that can no longer be found. It is also known as the Flower of Boundaries that connects life and death, and it gets its nourishment from destruction. A painfully beautiful flower. If you gift it to someone, you will be able to share that person's last moment in a dream.

s4.name: Rest in Peace
s4.description: Upon taking a deathblow, enters a coffin for 5 sec and heals 411702 + 6% of Max HP. Gains immunity to all DMG while inside the coffin.
s4.light: While inside the Coffin, deal DMG worth 5% of max HP to nearby enemies.
s4.dark: Upon activation, stun all enemies for 2 sec.

t5.dark: Each hit of Jane's attacks increase her ATK and Recovery Rate by 1% each. (Maximum stack number is 50)

uw.name: The Bluewind, Coventina
description: Grants a 10% chance to deal M.DMG equal to 100% of ATK and inflicts Electric Shock on 2 random enemies through a normal attack. If the target is already inflicted with Electric Shock, stuns the target for 2 sec.

Grants a 25% chance to deal M.DMG equal to 250% of ATK stat and inflicts Electric Shock on 2 random enemies through a normal attack. If the target is already inflicted with Electric Shock, stuns the target for 2 sec.
uw.story: A staff resembling the four-winged thunderbird. Indeed, it has been crafted from a feather of a thunderbird, a beast considered holy among the Skywind Orcs. The staff has the power to communicate with the sky, read the weather, and control the air. To a Skywind shaman who uses the power of lightning, this staff is the ultimate medium.

s1.name: Thunderbolt
s1.description: Drops 5 lightning bolts upon a random enemy, dealing 252550 M.DMG and inflicting Electrify. Electrified enemy is stunned for 3 sec.
s1.light: Mana cost is reduced by 1.
s1.dark: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.

s2.name: Healing Rain
s2.description: HP of all allies is healed by 542930 for 5 sec.
s2.light: Allies take 25% less DMG while skill is in effect.
s2.dark: In exchange for 1 additional Mana Cost, additionally heal allies by 5% of their Max HP.

[Healing Rain] Absorbs DMG of 500% ATK and creates a shield that grants Immunity to CC for 1 sec when used upon allies with full HP.
ut.story: Mask of the auspicious thunderbird that brings rain. Once the Healing Droplets of the Skywind shaman begin, the soul of the thunderbird stays by those who were hit by Healing Rain and recovers their tired bodies.

s3.name: Swift Wind
s3.description: For 15 sec, all allies' ATK is increased by 18126 , and ATK Spd is increased by 350.
s3.light: ATK boost is increased by 40%.
s3.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.

ut.story: Feather from a thunderbird, guardian of rain and thunder. The high ranking shamans of the Skywind Tribe commune through the feathers of a thunderbird. Shamans use this feather accessory when using Swift Wind to become one with the thunderbird, increasing ATK and ATK Spd of all allies.

s4.name: Chain Lightning
s4.description: Deals 59261 M.DMG to 4 enemies every 15 sec, and inflicts Electric Shock for 20 sec. Enemies inflicted with Electric Shock will take a total M.DMG of 103440 over 20 sec.
s4.light: Crit Chance is increased by 400.
s4.dark: If there is 1 enemy, Stun duration is increased by 3 sec.

t5.dark: When taking DMG, decreases ATK Spd of the attacking enemy by 300 for 5 sec. This effect is activated only once every 5 sec.

uw.name: Flowing Circle, Eltoirre
description: Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 80% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 96% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 115% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 138% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 166% of DMG dealt to target.
Upon a Crit Hit, heals the ally with the lowest HP by 200% of DMG dealt to target.
uw.story: An ankh crafted in the shape of a phoenix. It symbolizes the natural cycle of life. In the ancient days, the nomads of the desert worshipped the blue dragon of the oasis as their protector. In return, she blessed them with rain and gave life to their crops. To show their gratitude, the nomads offered her various treasures, including Lazulia, the gem of water. Although she had no particular interest in material wealth, she accepted their gratitude, and used the treasures to build a temple within the oasis. This ankh is the sacred symbol of the temple, and contains the mighty power of water.

s1.name: Healing Droplets
s1.description: Heals max 338882 HP of all allies, proportional to their lost HP.
s1.light: Heal rate is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Upon healing, M. Crit Resistance rises by 25%.

s2.name: Bubble Shield
s2.description: Shields an ally with the lowest HP for 15 sec to block 879673 DMG, and grants CC Immunity. While Shield is in effect, heals 35192 HP per sec, and gains Immunity to CC.
s2.dark: Target's M. Crit Resistance is increased by 25%.

ut.name: Oasis Crystal
description: [Bubble Shield] Reduces Cooldown by 12% and dispels Negative Effects from the target.

ut.story: Water essence that the Blue Dragons protect. The essence of an oasis that the Blue Dragons brought to the desert at the beginning of the world. Protecting and defending this is the sacred mission of the Priestess of Water Laias, and it is her favorite thing to do. The Oasis Crystal leads the Priestess of Water who uses the Bubble Shield to the person who most needs her help.

s3.name: Festival of the Flow
s3.description: Deals 210084 M.DMG to nearby enemies and knocks them down. All allies, excluding self, recovers 2 orbs of mana. Afterwards, for 12 sec, creates a whirlpool that deals 140066 M.DMG to random enemies and knocks them down for 2 sec.
s3.light: DMG effect occurs every 3 sec.
s3.dark: Heals all allies by 15% of their max HP.

ut.name: Papyrus of the Flow

[Festival of the Flow] Whirlpool effect targets 2 enemies and all allies recover additional 1250 mana.
ut.story: A sample of the ancient scripture, the Book of Chaos, that was swept away. The Book of Chaos is a historic scripture that is passed down to the Priest of Water, and it has records of culture, magic, and various fields. It was sealed in the golden Shrine of Flow along with Laias, but most of the book disappeared while she was asleep. The remaining Papyrus of the Flow is a boosting spell of the Festival of the Flow.

s4.name: Blessing of the Water Dragon
s4.description: All allies' M.DEF is increased by 4212 , and M.Crit Hit Resistance is increased by 250.
s4.light: M.DEF increase rate increases by 20%, and M. Crit Resistance increases by 100
s4.dark: Increases self CC Resist by 400.

t5.dark: Laias increases M.DEF equal of 5% of her ATK to allies she heals, as well as giving them 75 mana each.

uw.name: Lakrak MK-1
description: Gains a 25% chance to obtain a stack of Gunpowder upon attacking. Each stack of Gunpowder increases ATK by 3%, ATK Spd by 30, and DMG to non-Hero enemies by 3%. Gunpowder stacks up to 7 times and cannot be removed.

Gains a 25% chance to obtain a stack of Gunpowder upon attacking. Each stack of Gunpowder increases ATK by 3.6%, ATK Spd by 36, and DMG to non-Hero enemies by 3.6%. Gunpowder stacks up to 7 times and cannot be removed.

Gains a 25% chance to obtain a stack of Gunpowder upon attacking. Each stack of Gunpowder increases ATK by 7.5%, ATK Spd by 75, and DMG to non-Hero enemies by 7.5%. Gunpowder stacks up to 7 times and cannot be removed.
uw.story: The destructive yet artistic magnum opus of a quirky Goblin inventor. This single-hand cannon packs the maximum amount of firepower a single Goblin can physically handle. Despite the dangerous amount of gunpowder used, this weapon has fortunately not blown up yet.

s1.name: Rapid Fire
s1.description: Attacks all frontal enemies in a straight line, dealing 236245 P.DMG and pushing them back. If the target is not a Hero, deals 100167 additional P.DMG and stuns them for 5 sec.

ut.story:
A high-performing mask that was made with special materials that Lakrak obtained from around the Orbis Continent.
This mask is made from Harpy's first feather, a dragon's scales, a leaf from the World Tree, and the empire's mithril, which are all hard to find. This mask protects one from poisonous gas as well as the blinding effect of Smoke Bombs.

s3.name: Glue Bomb
s3.description: Attaches a Glue Bomb to a random enemy that explodes in 3 sec. The explosion deals max 515914 P.DMG proportional to enemy's current HP to enemies in range, and inflicts Stun for 3 sec. Upon attaching the Glue Bomb, target is inflicted with Stun for 2 sec.
s3.light: Mana cost is increased by 1, and attacks a random target 2 times.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Goblincraft Special High-Density Gunpowder

ut.story: Gunpowder made with Lakrak's dangerous secret recipe. Lakrak believed that simple explosions weren't effective enough in terms of battle strategy, so he added some formic acid and stinging nettle poison to add a stunning effect. It requires an extremely accurate filtering process, and he uses it in secret to avoid abuse.

Rune of Frailty - Increases Crit Chance by 500. Rune of Healing - Dispels CC inflicted on caster before the skill is cast. Rune of Silence - Increases Silence duration by 1 sec.

Rune of Healing - Dispels CC inflicted on caster before the skill is cast. Rune of Silence - Increases Silence duration by 1 sec.
uw.story: The phoenix is a holy beast that symbolizes eternal life. As elusive as the beast itself is, its feather is considered extremely rare as well. It is said that a quill crafted from a phoenix feather is a powerful magical tool in its own right. Runes drawn with this quill can serve as a powerful medium for Rune Magic.

s1.name: Rune of Frailty
s1.description: Engraves a rune on the target, dealing up to 180614 P.DMG that ignores DEF based on missing HP and reducing their P.DEF by 50% for 8 sec.
s1.light: Cooldown is reduced by 2 sec.
s1.dark: Target number increased to 2.

s2.name: Rune of Healing
s2.description: Heals 210188 HP of all allies.
s2.dark: Increase ally P.DEF for 25% for 10 sec after healing.

Ink made by extracting young leaves from the World Tree. Only 10 droplets can be produced in a year. The magic spells written with this ink grant great vitality to the body.
It's very precious and hard to obtain, so Leo doesn't use it unless it's for a special occasion.

ut.story: Ancient sorcery codex. A codex written by respected sorcerers that contains the principle behind magic that uses all of life and creation. It's written in an unknown language, so only part of it can be decoded. If the ancient text system is discovered, it might be possible to use spells without any cost whatsoever.

s4.name: Rune of Protection
s4.description: Every 10 sec, engraves a rune upon the ally with the lowest HP and recovers a total of 277700 HP for 10 sec.

uw.name: Scarlet Ruler, Dominicia

uw.story: A staff of blood that has been passed down in the family of the Vampire Lord through the generations. Its crimson color symbolizes the authority, insight, and the absolute power of the Vampire Lord. Deep in the underground of the Galia Plains is the holy land of the Vampires. This legendary staff lies there, ready to appear at the call of the master worthy of it, wherever that may be.

s1.name: Blood Orb
s1.description: Deals 237424 M.DMG to target enemy, and target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec. Per every stacked Blood Curse, DMG is increased by 0.5%. Upon use, consumes 10% of current HP.
s1.light: Mana cost is increased by 1 orb but DMG is boosted by 100%.
s1.dark: Target takes 25% increased M.DMG for 10 sec.

s2.name: Blood Zone
s2.description: Deals 313194 M.DMG to target enemy and creates a Blood Zone that lasts for 10 sec around the target. Enemies within the Blood Zone receives 22397 M.DMG every 0.5 sec, and M.DEF is reduced by 30%. Per every stacked Blood Curse, DMG is increased by 0.5%. Upon use, consumes 20% of current HP.
s2.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 3 sec.

ut.name: Spell of Bloody Mist

ut.story:
Magic tool of the successor of blood.
The spells of the pure Vampire Lord's family have been passed down through generations. The successor of Lewisia is Vampire Sir Lusben, and the Spell of Bloody Mist is a gift from him. Lewisia hates anything that has to do with being a successor, but she likes how the Blood Zone reduces her fatigue, so she enjoys using it.

s3.name: Blood Banquet
s3.description: Attacks enemies in a straight line 3 times, dealing a total of 274407 M.DMG and inflicting Stun for 3 sec. Per every stacked Blood Curse, DMG is increased by 0.5% Upon use, consumes 10% of current HP.
s3.light: Upon attacking an enemy with over 80 stacks of Blood Curse, all skill cooldown is reduced by 5%.
s3.dark: Mana cost is reduced by 1.

ut.name: Blood of the Ancients
description: [Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 20%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.
[Blood Banquet] DMG is increased by 24%, and upon Crit Hit, recovers 400 mana.

ut.story: Ancient vampire queen's blood. The more pure-blooded a vampire is, the stronger their mana blood. The greatest of them all is the ancient vampire queen's blood, and vampires who drink her blood will have unlimited life and mana. It is a highly addictive type of blood, so be careful when using it.

s4.name: Blood Dominator
s4.description: When HP is 50% or above, ATK is increased by 15594 and DEF Pen. is increased by 250. Blood Curse can be stacked max 100 times, and cannot be dispelled.

s4.dark: All allies' heal rate is increased by 20% and all enemies' heal rate is reduced by 20%.

uw.story: The legend has it that, once every 100 years, the World Tree bestows one of its branches to a chosen one. The branch radiates with eternal life, granting immense power and knowledge to its owner. Fusing the branch with the Stone of the Forest, an Elven treasure, Lorraine created this staff. Now, she can call upon the forces of nature and remain connected to the World Tree wherever she goes.

s1.name: Thornbush Forest
s1.description: Attacks 3 times at random, dealing 243273 M.DMG to enemies in range and inflicting 1 stack of Poison with each attack.

s1.dark: Enemies with 5 or more stacks of Poison are shackled for 3 sec upon hit.

ut.story:
The beautiful but poisonous Belladonna.
It's a dangerous plant that only the Great Sage can handle. The little Belladonna that is mixed up with vines poisons enemies and makes them defenseless against magic attacks.

s3.name: Wrath of the Forest

ut.story: Proof of the unity between the Druids and the World Tree. The great sages of Elidora have always maintained a deep bond with the World Tree. The roots of the World Tree are proof of the deep bond with the Druids. They attack enemies with supernatural DMG whenever Druids shout the Wrath of the Forest to show nature's fury and hostility.

uw.story: A slingshot made from hyacinth, a silver tree that only grows in extremely cold regions. It is said that hyacinths have been blessed by the Queen of Ice, and are able to bear bright red fruits even in the coldest weather. Simply holding onto a hyacinth branch allows one to ignore the coldness around the holder. These blessed trees also have the power to call upon snowstorms and frost. Needless to say, these powers are best harnessed by a weapon carved from one of these trees.

A carrot that grew from receiving moonlight a thousand times.
Those hit by this carrot will have all evil stripped away from them, and they'll be able to tell apart good from bad.

uw.story: A mysterious raven that can travel across dimensions. Its intelligence and shrewdness are certainly not those of a mere bird. In truth, it is a monster filled with dark energy, much like Demons. Indeed, it is said that this beast is as powerful as a high-ranking Demon. Some claim that it occasionally flies over fields of battle, speaking in human languages. Much of this creature's identity is still shrouded in mystery.

ut.story: Ashes of a grey messenger that announces the end. These are the ashes of the raven that flew into the Church of Lua right before the Republic of Gray collapsed a hundred years ago. Everyone ignored the ominous messenger, and only Priestess Maria cared for it until its last day. Even after its death, it has helped Maria expand her area of darkness by pouring its dark energy on her.

uw.story: A curious basket always carried by May whenever she goes hunting for new materials. This mysterious basket contains an infinite amount of space, and turns anything that enters it weightless. This allows May to bring back a ridiculous number of items from a single trip. At a quick glance, it might as well be filled with picnic foods. However, rumors claim that, whenever she takes it to her hunting trips, she packs it with......Other questionable things. Or so they say.

Special cake made by Juno. Its smells very sweet.
May loves it as a snack. No one knows why she doesn't tell anyone what she put in it.

ut.story: During the days of the ancient civilization, someone stole the spells of the sages and gathered their power in a single crystal ball. It seems like it was part of a plan to become the greatest shaman at the time. But there are no historic records of this crystal ball, and it was found far away from the village, near Eden River. Different elemental spells are mixed up in one place, making it dangerous, so it's unknown how its powers will be released.

uw.story: The story goes back to when Mediana's poison experiments were still being kept secret from her peers. One day, a fellow doctor noticed the giant syringe she had made. Impressed by its sheer size, he asked her: 'Look at the size of that thing. Shouldn't you at least give it a name?' To this, Mediana replied, nonchalantly: 'Oh... Just call it... Piston.'

ut.story: A special potion that has two type of effects. Mediana wondered if there was a way to handle attack and recovery at once. She went to the library and read a dusty book called 'Slimes Can Also Make Cannons.' Mediana was reading just for fun, but found a way to apply the principle of cannons into her piston. She was then able to invent the Special Potion of Double Reaction and maximize recovery and attack when using Special Water Cannon. Mediana is still thankful to the author of the book who gave her the inspiration.

ut.story: A special potion that has the teachings of a master. The genius surgeon and expert on anatomy, Doctor Aldini, is Mediana's master. Doctor Aldini recognized her talent early on, and he taught her extraordinary medical knowledge that couldn't have been imagined in the Church of Lua. The unidentifiable potion that was made with her master's special recipe increases the effect of the Strengthening Potion.

uw.story: A magic gear created by Sonia, the Archmage of Blue. It is enchanted with magic that allows it to reach incredible speeds. It is also enchanted with a special spell that always guides it back to its owner after it's thrown. It is the best gift Sonia could give to Mirianne, who is both a family and a friend to her. In other words, it's a unique expression of love reserved only for Mirianne.

ut.story: Ring that Mirianne purchased at the 'Amazing Magic Toy Shop' in Orvel. She engraved Sonia's and her name in the ring. The two make a set, and it allows each other to teleport to the location of the other once a day. Though, Sonia doesn't use it since it's troublesome... It may be a toy, but Mirianne is happy that there's one more way for her to protect Sonia.

uw.story: Back when Miruru reigned as the pirate empress, she was feared by sailors and a major threat to the naval forces of Orvelia and the empire. The cannons on her ship were especially terrifying to the Navy. The most powerful of them was the Leviathan, the ship's main cannon. After being cursed, she took one thing with her as she fled from her mutinous crew. Its value as a weapon is in fact far more valuable than any gold or loot. She took with her the Leviathan, the most powerful cannon in her arsenal. After numerous modifications, the once-terror of the sea now serves as a mobile artillery.

ut.story:
Sextant of Pirate King Olga, who was the first to discover the new continent.
Pirate King Olga went past the Orbis Continent to find a new continent, following a revelation from the gods. The sextant can calculate the most accurate location and angle in the world. Miruru uses the sextant to boost the damage from rolling bomb attacks, but she doesn't remember how she ended up with it.

ut.story: Cannonball engraved with the symbol of the Miruru Pirates. Miruru still vividly remembers her glorious past. Her fluttering flag emblazoned with a shark, and the sounds of explosions that were at her command. Those fond memories of enemy ships sinking in terror still remain within her. Miruru is using special cannonballs to attack enemies, while waiting for the glorious days to come back once again.

s4.description: When dealing a normal attack, shoots additional bullet with a 60% chance of dealing 37358 P.DMG to all enemies.
s4.light: Increases ATK by 0.5% for 10 seconds upon a Crit Hit. This effect can be stacked up to max 100 times.
s4.dark: Activation chance changes to 80%.

t5.dark: Miruru stacks Darkness depending on the number of enemies she hits. When she reaches 50 stacks, she goes berserk, boosting her Atk Spd by 800 and her ATK by 20%.

uw.name: Roar of Madness, Velkinoth

uw.story: A pair of magical weapons that absorb the bloodlust of their user to enhance their own firepower. Each pull of their triggers pushes the user deeper and deeper into the craze of the battle. It is said that when a master craftsman creates a weapon, it develops a soul. Berkinos seem to have the soul of the war god. According to the story, when their creator pulled their triggers for the first time, he suddenly turned pale with terror and threw them into a river.

s2.dark: Bang! Bang! chance is increased by 10%.

ut.story:
Steel Wolf's special barrage box.
The Steel Wolves were infamous for being too violent and making it impossible to revitalize their enemies. The most infamous Silver Wolf only uses the maximized Wolf Barrage Box that he got from the owner of the Gold Bar.

s3.name: Dance with me!!
s3.description: Sprays gunshot at a random enemy 12 times, dealing a total of 570060 P.DMG. Each damage inflicts 1 stack of Mark of Death that cannot be dispelled. Per every stacked Mark of Death, 'Dance with me!!' DMG is increased by 1%.

ut.story: Rune of the greatest mercenaries, the Steel Wolves. A rune that symbolizes the mercenary Steel Wolves, who were called the demons of the battlefield. Mitra was called the Silver Wolf of the battlefield. Even after he's left the mercenaries, he carries it in remembrance of the battle against the naval officer of the empire.

s4.dark: All cooldowns are reduced by 0.3 when hitting a target with 100 stacks.

t5.dark: Upon a Crit Hit, increase Crit DMG by 0.5% and Atk Spd by 5. Max stack number is 100.

uw.story: In the heart of the Dragia Volcano, there exists a smithy. Hundreds of years ago, Temeraire, the ancient fire dragon, created a set of magically enchanted gear. Using lava infused with the power of the volcanic fire, he forged a shield and a sword capable of incinerating anything. During the war against Demons, Temeraire presented these to a human warrior. Unfortunately, the warrior is said to have been defeated by Morrah. No one has seen this legendary gear since then. That is, until Morrah reappeared on the front line.

s1.description: Deals 58356 M.DMG to enemies in range and knocks them down, inflicting 3 stacks of Flame. Then for 15 sec, each auto attack deals 11763 M.DMG and inflicts 1 stack of Flame on enemy. Per each stacked Flame, DMG is increased by 2%. Each Flame stack deals separate M.DMG and reduces Heal rate by 1%.

s1.dark: Reduces cooldown by 6% per each enemy hit.

ut.story:
Gloves made with a dark Hatchling's bones and skin. Morrah made it a hundred years ago by collecting the Hatchlings she killed when she went out to hunt dragons.
It's very durable to even withstand Morrah's flames, and even imbues a stronger power to let those flames blaze up even more.
Morrah really likes these gloves.

ut.story: A strange fragment that came from the Dimensional Rift. Inside the fragment, there's a flame that kills anything that is living. The energy from its dimension is condensed within it. It's absolutely needed to complete Maria's plan.

uw.story: A cursed pair of gauntlets crafted from the claws of the Mad Demon Baroro, which was defeated during the war. Several times the size of the average human hands, these gauntlets directly connect to the nerves of the wearer, allowing the wielder to control them effortlessly. Although they grant immense power, they also break into the mind of the wearer, slowing eating away at the soul. Only a true warrior of noble conviction, strong will and undying spirit may handle these cursed weapons. They are the perfect weapons for a warrior with a strong will that shines even in the darkness of the abyss.

ut.story:
The scarf that the dead Himmullis had on. Naila always has it on her.
Himmullis use to always tell Naila to be proud of being a Harpy.
The scarf contains the sadness of losing family, and this makes Naila furious.

ut.story: A ritual offering of ancient religious people who worshipped the wind. It is a precious treasure among the Harpies, and it is said to be given to the most powerful Harpy warrior. The moment one wears this mask, they'll be able to freely use the wind. They can also attack at the speed of light.

uw.story: There exists a universal string that connects different dimensions. This sword is the key that can sever and reconnect this string. It is bestowed upon the dimensional arbitrator sworn to protect the balance of the universe. It can be duplicated indefinitely, but will only grant its powers to the chosen one.

s1.dark: Max Blade stack is increased by 1.

ut.story:
A legendary sword that has transcended eras.
A legendary sword that was made with the light of the sun and the melted souls of those in pain. It is one of the required items for Dimension Cleaver since it is durable enough to withstand dimension and can be made very sharp.

s3.dark: When there are 5 blade stacks or more, DMG is increased by 70%.

ut.story: A required item for wizards who go through dimensions. The Dimensional Stone is a magic stone that is loved by those who go through dimensions, and it contains unlimited energy. However, the power that one can use from it depends on the individual's ability. Only high ranking wizards can use it effectively.

s4.name: Hidden Blade
s4.description: Each auto attack fires an additional blade that deals 41764 P.DMG. The number of target increases depending on the number of Blade stacks.

s4.dark: There is a 10% chance of dispelling enemy positive effects.

uw.story: After Oddy's watch was zapped with the Redpur curse and gained the power to control time over a living being, he used the infinite time he gained to research its possible applications. When he finally created a watch containing the essence of time magic after so many trials, Oddy found out that the secret of Redpur magic originated from moonlight and the shadow it creates. He named his masterpiece 'Tempodiana,' and gave it the nickname 'Moonshade Countdown.'

s1.name: Time Fracture
s1.description: Deals 76654 M.DMG to enemies in a straight line, and inflicts Petrify for 3 sec.
s1.light: DMG is increased by 40%.
s1.dark: Cooldown is reduced by 1.5 sec.

s2.dark: While in cooldown, auto-attacks will reduce the cooldown of 'Time Fragments' by 1 sec.

ut.story:
Time Fragments that fell from the shadows of the moon. Sometimes, Time Fragments fall from another dimension from the effect of the shadow of the moon that appears when using time magic.
The Time Fragments are small, but when gathered, they become a giant Fragment Collection of records, which give ceaseless inspiration to the caster.

s3.name: Time Distortion

s3.dark: When there are 5 or more enemies, increases DMG by 100%. Hit Enemies take extra 50% DMG for 10 sec.

description: [Time Distortion] DMG is increased by 20% and all allies' negative effects are dispelled.

ut.story: Fur of the Red Fur chief hung in the shadow of the moon. It is said that the mythical creature, the Red Fur Chief, uses the shadow of the moon during full moon to go through dimensions and dance. The Red Fur Chief dances until the shadow of the moon disappears, and it is said that his tail sometimes gets stuck in the pathway. The fur of the colorful mythical creature gets stuck in the rift of time and space and stops time temporarily. Oddy uses the fur from the traces of the shadows of the moon to make a skein and uses it effectively for Time Distortion.

s4.dark: Changes the chance to Petrify to 40%.

t5.dark: Every 10 sec, any skills on cooldown for 4 random allies have their cooldowns reduced by 1 sec.

uw.name: Dragon Hearts, Andarta Andraste
description: Every 15 sec, deals 160% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.
Every 14 sec, deals 192% of ATK as M.DMG to 2 random enemies and inflicts Frost. Enemies already inflicted with Frost will become inflicted with Freeze for 5 sec.

uw.story: Andarta and Andraste were two dragons who were defeated by the Demons during the war. They were a pair connected at the soul. They were lovers who understood each other better than anyone. Even as they lay dying, they refused to stay apart, and made one final request to Pavel, their comrade. Pavel granted their final wish by transferring their souls into their hearts, and then turning them into a pair of gems. Even though the two have lost their bodies, they remain together, and as inseparable as ever.

ut.story:
The dragon of ice gifted this brooch to a young Pavel, and imbued it with its breath.
But after the dragon of ice and Pavel became one, it reminds Pavel to not leave him. It can inflict pain that pierces the heart.
Imbues a chill to Pavel's mana, making his magic even sharper.

ut.story: Frozen blood of the winter spirit. Pavel found it deep inside the Ice Cave and made it into earrings. A harsh chill and severe pain can be felt from it, but it increases Pavel's mana to its limit.

uw.story: The Dark Dragons are Demons created to slay the dragons, the arbitrators of the world. During the war 100 years ago, these Dark Dragons killed and devoured countless dragons. A few of the surviving dragons have gone insane from the rage and the shame, and they eventually turned into Mad Dragons. They are now nothing more than giant monsters powered by their destructive instincts. Phillop and his Dwarves have been hunting these Dark Dragons and Mad Dragons since the Demon War, gathering their remains to forge legendary items.

ut.story:
Ancient Dwarf King's capricorn helmet.
It is made from the gold of dragons that was obtained after defeating the greedy dark dragon Bokrug. The magnificent golden horn of the helmet is imbued with the dark dragon's magic that will slow down an enemy who is hit with Headbutt.

ut.story: A hammer that the ancient Dwarven King received as a gift from the Earth Elemental. It was a gift that the King received for saving the Gnome Kingdom from the attacks of the evil Earth Dragon Azi Dahaka. Upon using Earth Incarnate, this ceremonial hammer, imbued with the blessing of the spirit of the earth, increases DEF with the power of the earth's spirit, and grants immunity to HP recovery and CC.

uw.story: During her military career, Priscilla felled countless enemies with her halberd. Although the halberd fell into a state of disrepair following her retirement, it was later resurrected as Exilius. This upgrade was a part of the order sent to Annette to create Mahitra for Aisha. This razor-sharp and incredibly durable new weapon even has the magical power to draw its enemies in. Those who have seen Priscilla slaughtering her Demon foes using this halberd claim that it was like watching an unstoppable storm.

Aisha's favorite ceramic tea cups that Priscilla has ready at all times.
Luxurious tea cups made from the best clay of the eastern continent across the sea. It's mostly used for tea time with Aisha, but it is also used when using Coordination with Priscilla.

ut.story: The first magic tool made by a wizard of Purple. The first gift that Aisha gave. Aisha created this magic tool because she felt bad that Priscilla used up so much power when using Turbulent Dance. The Mana Stone of Gravity relieves the pressure from the body when using Turbulent Dance, and it increases its effect.

uw.story: The Stein family boasts a long lineage that dates back to the early days of the empire. The honor of the family, however, stems from the skills of its warriors, not its noble bloodline. Aria Stein was a legendary master of the blade. Remembered as one of the most skilled warriors in the history of the empire, she laid the foundation of the Stein family honor. Reina is her descendant. Aria's sword, Livatas, currently belongs to Reina. Light as a feather yet strong enough to withstand any strike, this sword helped Reina earn the nickname 'Flash.'

s1.description: Rapidly stabs the enemy, dealing 60396 P.DMG. Upon a Crit Hit, stacks 1 Wound and resets cooldown. Per every stacked Wound, DMG dealt by Float Like a Butterfly is increased by 20%. Gains immunity to all DMG while the skill is in use.

ut.story:
The ring that Reina received after defeating her master. It's too big, so she wears it on her thumb.
It looks simple and ungainly, but the spirit of fighting is hidden within the rune letters engraved in the ring. Staring at the ring of her master makes her feel like she will be getting more work today.

ut.story: A honorable medal given to the fastest mercenary. It's said to be a keepsake from Hersz, the fastest warrior in the world. Wearing this medal will make the bearer's body feel lighter, and they'll be able to predict the opponent's movements.

uw.story: It is the duty of a soul guide to lead the lost souls onto the right path, to help them move on to the next life. This lamp, powered by a mysterious orb created long ago by a dragon from a distant land, is a treasure of the Tamians. The orb at its core allows nearby souls to materialize, making it possible for its wielder to talk to them directly. As such, it is the ultimate medium for a soul guide. Tamian chieftains have used this relic to carry out the sacred duties of a soul guide for generations. Now, in the face a great danger that threatens the world, the lamp has been passed on to Rephy, the most powerful soul guide in existence.

ut.story: A collection of the energy that is created when a life is born. It's very warm and gentle, so souls like it. Rephy uses it to start a fire in a lamp to borrow the power of the souls. When a seed is put in a lamp, it shines brightly, like when the sun was first born.

ut.story: An ornament that was used for the memorial ceremonies of deceased royalty in ancient times. Inside the green jewel, there's a crystallized tear of the mythical creature that leads people to death. It's used as a resting places to comfort the emptiness within souls.

uw.story: When the Holy Sword Aea was bestowed upon Kyle, it appeared in the Temple of Lua located north of the King's Plains. When Kyle removed the sword from the altar, it released a powerful wave of light that turned the entire vicinity into a sacred ground. Everything contained within the Temple was turned into holy relics. Teoria, the central pillar of the Temple, absorbed the greatest amount of holy energy of them all.

ut.story:
Shield of the arbiter of Lua's Holy Knights. Artifact given to those who've earned the title of Arbiter from the Lua's Holy Knights.
An artifact imbued with Goddess Lua's blessing, it protects those under the benevolence of the god, and punishes enemies without mercy.

ut.story:
The seal that Ricardo used for the pledge of the Holy Warrior. When first appointed as a Holy Warrior, knights leave their names on the certificate of oath with their seals. Ricardo made his seal with his affection for the Church of Lua.
He still carries it now, after all this time.

uw.story: The essence of the most sophisticated imperial technology. Requiring superhuman precision, this rifle cannot be handled by a regular person. It has been magically enchanted to allow the shooter to see impossibly long distances. Even the greatest scope in the world, however, is useless in the hands of someone who can't aim with it. As such, the performance of this rifle has significantly depended on the skills of its users. Rodina, gifted with superb vision and precise control, is a suitable owner of this rifle. She went one step further and customized it to her preference, naming it Rodina Custom.

A sniper rifle support that Pavel made so that it would fit Rodina's small body.
It's made of crystals so it's very firm and sturdy. This support is enough to aim at any target.

ut.story: A barrage that was requested to the legendary blacksmith of the empire. It contains gunpowder made from the sturdy egg of a pitta and the jaw bone of a dragon turtle. It was made small so that Rodina can use it easily, but it has the power to destroy anything.

uw.story: The most legendary sword in Orvelia. This sacred blade has been passed down the royal lineage of Orvelia since the kingdom's birth, symbolizing the true authority of the monarch. King Kyle used this sword as well, until he was chosen by the Holy Sword Aea. Blessed with the power of light, its blade can disable any magic by cutting through its flow. Only a knight of noble bloodline and righteous pride can wield this sword. Those who wish to lift it must pass the trial of the royal family, a feat only accomplished by Scarlet, aside from Kyle.

ut.story:
Pendant made by Scarlet, whose principles won't let her ignore injustice or kneel in the face of cowardice. She gifted one each to the people she relies on: Clause and Demia.
The shining wings of the royal emerald, which symbolize justice, are embedded inside the pendant. One can straighten oneself out by staring at the pendant that reflects one's eyes. She looks at it each time she feels despair by looking at the people who lay blame on her father Veroglance II.

ut.story: A celebratory flag that was made to praise the king when Orvelia was first founded. Whenever she sees the flag in the office, it angers her to think of the treacherous subjects who reduced her father to a scarecrow and the flatterers who ruined the country. This made Scarlet even more determined to restore Orvelia's days of glory and to establish a stronger throne.

uw.story: A bow blessed with the breath of Sylph, the Wind Elemental. Only a person of noble character may wield it. When drawn, the bow nocks itself with a deadly magic arrow created from the breath of the Elemental. Guided by the Wind Elemental, the arrow never misses its target, no matter where it's hiding. Selene has shared special bonds with Elementals since childhood. She was especially close to Sylph, who enchanted her bow as a sign of their friendship.

It is said that the Goddess of Hunting and the Moon cared for the Elves who protected the holy forest, and she lent her power to them through the artifact. The silver arrow imbued with the power of the Goddess of the Moon has a mysterious power that allows the user to defeat his enemy and boost DMG.

uw.story: A sphere of electricity created by Sonia based on the beast core that is now her own heart. She has shown great talent in making magic gear, and this is the first weapon she ever created. It's a bit lacking in stability, mostly due to the overwhelming electricity it contains. The powerful electrical storm created by this weapon is truly dangerous for any enemy. In fact, anyone besides Sonia who touches it would be instantly fried by the immense current that flows through it.

ut.story: A cloak that Mirianne made for Sonia by braving a danger. There was a time when Sonia's clothes would burn from the explosion of the electricity that ran through her body. Mirianne saw that and plucked out the ereth plant that is said to grow by being struck by lightning. She pulled out its thread and completed a cloak with it. Sonia saw Mirianne's blistered hands from the electricity, and she cried in silence for a long time. A piece of clothing just for Sonia that can't be found anywhere else.

ut.story: Heart of Vikal, who is called a holy beast. He eats the elements of light and dark from the world, so his heart is full of thunder from the collision between the two elements. If someone unskilled were to touch it, he would be absorbed by its power. But Sonia, who is made up of the core of lightning, absorbed that power and obtained mana that is beyond imaginable.

uw.story: The Demon War dates back to 100 years ago. During this war, the greatest threat to mankind was, without a doubt, the high-ranking Demon officers. Kaitasis, the Demon of the Calm, was especially dangerous among them. Countless wizards and priests were slaughtered by this Demon who specifically targeted magic users for their souls. Eventually, Kaitasis was defeated by Kyle, and its core was sealed away. However, years later, the core came into the possession of the Laughing Mask and it once again served as an instrument of death.

A multi-purpose tool of Laughing Masks used for assassination.
It is a unique item for Laughing Masks, known for their speed and efficiency in eliminating their targets. Optimized to the wearer's attacking patterns, it improves the handling of throwing weapons and enhances continuous attacks while casting Blade Tornado.

ut.story: A dagger given to those who complete the first mission of the Laughing Mask. There's a rule that says that assassins should always carry the dagger that has traces of their target. The silent dagger that assassins carry like an amulet consistently whispers to them about death.

uw.story: A spear said to have been forged from a bolt of lightning. Electricity constantly flows around this impressive spear that stands as tall as an average adult male. Forging a spear from lightning was a tremendous task. But then again, Jin was no ordinary blacksmith. He smelted a huge mana stone infused with a red dragon's blood. He used this to contain the lightning before forging it into a spear. Aside from its chosen master, no person can touch this weapon. When its two pieces are combined, it lets out a tremendous flux of energy that resembles a dragon's roar.

ut.story:
Called a thunderbolt from the sky. Legios is also called a holy beast.
The power of Legios was so strong that when they made it into a weapon, the Republic of Gray couldn't contain all of its power. So the greatest piece was put in the Spear of Lightning, and the remaining pieces were put into different places. One of those pieces was put into God of Lightning's Necklace. It is said that anyone with this necklace can commune with the Spear of Lightning and get closer to the power of Legios.

uw.story: Nightmare Kitrax was known as the best, and the most terrifying, of the succubi. After devouring Kitrax whole, soul and all, Viska came up with her most powerful weapon yet. This spike is the physical manifestation of fear and despair. Death is the only fate of its unfortunate victims. It constantly injects fear into its victim's soul, reducing even the most formidable enemy to mere prey.

ut.story:
Claw of the violent magic beast Urgol, who is said to bite off souls.
The day Viska decided to hunt in the Material World, she devoured Urgol from the Demon World. Combined with the ability that Viska has to absorb the power of others, it displayed great power, and it is essential to eat Demons who trespassed to the Material World.

ut.story: Crystallized form of great demon Curapis's soul, who has the power to get big. He was one of the first demons that Viska hunted in the Demon World, and it is said that it used its big body to dominate his enemies. But battle isn't all about strength, but using one's brain as well. The giant demon was defeated and eaten by a predator who used her brain. The power to get big became Viska's, and she can use it freely now.

s4.light: Enemies that had their Souls stolen have their CC resistance reduced by 250 for 10 sec.
s4.dark: Per each stacked Soul, ATK is increased by 10%

t5.dark: Per each stacked Soul, Crit Chance is increased by 50 and Crit DMG is increased by 30%.

uw.story: An enchanted weapon made from the bones, tendons, and pieces of hide the Mad Dragon Svelta. Too heavy for a normal human to even lift, let alone draw, this monstrous greatbow is a combination of the siege weapon technologies from the Dark Elves and Dwarves. Only those with incredible muscular strength such as Yanne can hope to handle this ridiculous bow. The Mad Dragon's soul still remains in this bow. Her ferocious energy rides on every arrow it fires, granting it the power to shatter through even the mightiest of walls.

uw.story: A hyper-accurate blowgun made by Requina herself. A special muting piece added at the end makes this already-quiet weapon almost completely silent. As the appearance of Demons began to hurt her business, she decided to utilize anything she could, not just poisons. She sought help from her elementalist friend, who imbued the blowgun with the wind's blessing. This gave the weapon firepower equal to that of a magic cannon. After adding Requina's ultra-deadly, Demon-slaying poison to it, it became a powerful and deadly weapon capable of killing any living being.

uw.story: Her approval is needed to process any important items in the Guild Alliance. An office item cherished by the founder of the Guild Alliance. A feather pen and folder put together in a set. The pen has a mana ball embedded in it so it requires mana instead of ink, and it must be used on a magic parchment that cannot be written on with a regular pen. The letters that are written by the writer cannot be erased without the writer's mana. Also, text can be written on the magic parchment without any limit, and it has a function to search for stuff one has written before. It makes Veronica's work that much more effective. Of course, it's useful when it's used for work, but outside of work...
